text: Taipei Main Station is a railway and metro station in Taipei, Taiwan. It is served by Taiwan High Speed Rail, the Taiwan Railways Administration, and the Tamsui-Xinyi Line and Bannan Lines of the Taipei Metro. The station code of the Tamsui-Xinyi line station is R10 and the station code of the Bannan line station is BL12. The Taoyuan Airport MRT's Taipei Main Station is also accessible via Taipei Main Station. == Station layout information == === Tamsui-Xinyi line === The station platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. === Bannan line === The station platforms are located underground. Platform 3 is for Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center or Kunyang. Platform 4 is for Dingpu or Far Eastern Hospital. Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Taipei Main Station
